data_table.description: The USC Electrophysiology (EPhys) table contains unique IDs for the EPhys recording, interpretation of the recording, protocol name and filename, image description and filename, file formation, and any additional notes related to the images.

variable.name: EPHYS_ID
variable.description: Unique ID for the Ephys recording

variable.name: IMAGE_FILENAME
variable.description: Image filename. These files are all available publicly through the dbGaP FTP site: ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/dbgap/studies/phs000833.

variable.name: IMAGE_NOTES
variable.description: Any additional remarks connected to the image
